title: How to Leverage Geo-partitioning
description:
Introduction As we’ve written about previously, geographically distributed databases like CockroachDB offer a number of benefits including reliability, security, and cost-effective deployments. We believe you shouldn’t have to sacrifice these upsides to realize impressive throughput and low latencies. That’s why we created geo-partitioning.
This blog post defines two new features, geo-partitioning and archival-partitioning, as well as explains when you might want to leverage these features. We previously provided a sneak-peak walkthrough of geo-partitioning that can be found here.

title: SAML SSO Authentication for Splunk with G Suite
